Package org.cooperari.core.scheduling

Cooperative scheduler implementation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CProgramState
    AbstRepresentation of program state.
    CProgramState.CElement
    Program state element.
    CThreadHandle
    Thread handle.
    CYieldPoint
    Yield point for a thread.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CGroupProgramState
    Program state representation returned by CProgramStateFactory.GROUP.
    CRawProgramState
    Program state representation returned by CProgramStateFactory.RAW.
    CScheduler
    Abstract class for scheduler implementations.
    CThreadLocation
    Thread location information.
    Memini
    History-dependent scheduler.
    Oblitus
    Memoryless scheduler.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CProgramStateFactory
    Program state factory.
    CSchedulerFactory
    Scheduler factory enumeration.
